Overview.content_preview: This document tracks dependencies between backlog items to help with sprint planning and risk management.

Dependency Visualization.content_preview:
```mermaid
graph TD
    %% Core Authentication Epic
    AUTH-001[User Registration] --> AUTH-002[Login Flow]
    AUTH-002 --> AUTH-003[Session Managem...

Hard Dependencies (Blocking).content_preview:
Dependencies that must be completed before the dependent item can start.

| Item | Depends On | Type | Reason |
|:-----|:-----------|:-----|:-------|
...

Soft Dependencies (Preferred).content_preview:
Dependencies that would be helpful but not blocking.

| Item | Depends On | Type | Reason |
|:-----|:-----------|:-----|:-------|
| UX-001 | AUTH-002 ...

Technical Dependencies.content_preview:
Infrastructure or framework requirements.

| Item | Depends On | Type | Reason |
|:-----|:-----------|:-----|:-------|
| All Features | TECH-001 | Tec...

Authentication Epic.content_preview:
- **Prerequisites**: Database schema, security policies
- **Provides**: User management, session handling
- **Blocks**: All user-specific features

User Experience Epic.content_preview:
- **Prerequisites**: Core features implemented
- **Provides**: Improved usability
- **Blocks**: None (enhancement)

Technical Debt Epic.content_preview:
- **Prerequisites**: Initial implementation
- **Provides**: Better maintainability
- **Blocks**: None (can be parallel)

High Risk Dependencies.content_preview:
Items with multiple dependencies or critical path items.

1. **AUTH-003 (Session Management)**
   - Blocks: 5+ features
   - Risk: High
   - Mitigatio...

Circular Dependencies.content_preview: None identified. All dependencies form a directed acyclic graph (DAG).

Sprint 1 Recommendations.content_preview:
- Focus on AUTH-001, AUTH-002, TECH-001
- These unlock the most future work

Sprint 2 Recommendations.content_preview:
- Complete AUTH-003
- Start PROF-001 if capacity allows
- Begin SEC-001, SEC-002

Parallel Work Opportunities.content_preview:
- UX items can progress with mockups
- Security items can be researched early
- Technical debt can be addressed anytime

When Creating New Items.content_preview:
1. Identify what it needs (dependencies)
2. Identify what needs it (dependents)
3. Update this map
4. Consider sprint placement

During Sprint Planning.content_preview:
1. Check dependencies are met
2. Avoid selecting blocked items
3. Prioritize items that unblock others

Handling Blocked Items.content_preview:
1. Mark as "Blocked" in backlog
2. Document blocking item
3. Re-evaluate in next planning

---

**Note**: This is a living document. Update whenever:
...
